attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public completely
attributes.additional_details: I want to see the sale of fireworks banned to the public with councils and sports clubs buying direct from the supplier.
attributes.background: Every year fireworks are used as a source of anti social behaviour between October and new years fireworks are set off every night making peoples lives a misery young children and animals suffering the most.  I propose the law be changed to public displays under a licence only
